title: How to Pair Up Your Bluetooth Phone on Your 2006 BMW 3 Series With CD Radio

steps.title: Enable Bluetooth on your cell phone, if needed.
steps.content: Enable Bluetooth on your cell phone, if needed.

steps.title: Place the Comfort Access remote control into the ignition slot, but DO NOT press the Start/Stop button.
steps.content: Place the Comfort Access remote control into the ignition slot, but DO NOT press the Start/Stop button.

steps.title: Press the knob in on the left side of the radio to power on the radio.
steps.content: Press the knob in on the left side of the radio to power on the radio.

steps.title: Press the MENU button on the radio.
steps.content: Press the MENU button on the radio.

steps.title: Turn the knob on the right side of the radio and scroll to PHONE.
steps.content: Turn the knob on the right side of the radio and scroll to PHONE. Press in on this knob.

steps.title: Turn the knob on the right side of the radio to scroll down to the bottom of the screen, and press in on it to select PAIR.
steps.content: Turn the knob on the right side of the radio to scroll down to the bottom of the screen, and press in on it to select PAIR.

steps.title: Go to the Bluetooth menu in your cell phone, and select your BMW (starting with the letters BMW, and ending with the last eight characters of your BMW's VIN).
steps.content: Go to the Bluetooth menu in your cell phone, and select your BMW (starting with the letters BMW, and ending with the last eight characters of your BMW's VIN). [1] X Research source

steps.title: When your cell phone asks for a passcode, enter an easy-to-remember passcode from one to sixteen digits and confirm it.
steps.content: When your cell phone asks for a passcode, enter an easy-to-remember passcode from one to sixteen digits and confirm it. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Enter the same passcode on your BMW'S CD radio using the soft keys, and press the soft key labeled CONFIRM.
steps.content: Enter the same passcode on your BMW'S CD radio using the soft keys, and press the soft key labeled CONFIRM. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Your Bluetooth-enabled cell phone is now paired with your BMW 3 Series.
steps.content: Your Bluetooth-enabled cell phone is now paired with your BMW 3 Series.

steps.title: Remove the Comfort Access remote control from the ignition slot.
steps.content: Remove the Comfort Access remote control from the ignition slot. You are done.
